cookies.banner.title: Notice
cookies.banner.description: We and selected partners, use cookies or similar technologies as specified in the {link}. You can consent to the use of such technologies or not by accepting or declining this notice.
cookies.banner.necessary: Use necessary cookies only needed by the website
cookies.banner.necessary.label: Solo cookie tecnici
cookies.banner.google: Allow Google Analytics cookies used for website statistics
cookies.banner.facebook: Allow Facebook Pixel cookies used for website statistics
cookies.banner.notes.text: Third-party analytics cookies used by StreetLib are comparable to cookies and other technical identifiers because:
cookies.banner.notes.list.1: - they are used only to produce aggregate statistics and in relation to a single site or a single mobile application;
cookies.banner.notes.list.2: - for those of third parties, at least the fourth component of the IP address is masked;
cookies.banner.notes.list.3: - third parties refrain from combining these analytics cookies with other processing (customer files or statistics of visits to other sites, for example) or from transmitting them to third parties. However, third parties are allowed to produce statistics with data relating to multiple domains, sites, or apps that can be traced back to the same publisher or business group.
